name: The Adventures of the Good Soldier Schwejk
storyline:
Do you know Schweik? He is the soldier who was declared unfit for military service due to idiocy, yet he is also the one who, strangely, can get away with everything he does.
Do you know why? No? We will tell you!
So, on an early August morning in 1914, Josef Schweik wakes up at home, where he is overtaken by the news of the assassination of Archduke Ferdinand. Europe is on the eve of the war, but Pan Josef has his own idea of ​​the balance of power and power alliances. And what's the matter - it's up to you, the gentlemen of the players, to find out.
